recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with the Parmesan cheese.
Drain the pasta and combine quickly with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add pancetta and season with pepper. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.description: A creamy avocado-based dip, perfect for chips or as a side.
steps: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh.
Mash the avocado in a bowl with a fork.
Mix in the onion, tomato, and lime juice.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for a hearty breakfast.
steps: In a bowl, mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk the milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden brown.
